component.name: TrguiNG
component.summary: Remote GUI for Transmission torrent daemon

description.p: TrguiNG is an alternative UI for controlling transmission torrent daemon running on the same machine or any other host that has exposed transmission rpc endpoint.

Features:
Multi tabbed interface for concurrent server connections
Torrent creation with fast multi threaded hashing
Powerful torrent filtering options
Efficient network usage
Configurable path mappings to directly access torrent files if their location is mounted locally
Latest transmission features support: labels, bandwidth groups, sequential download
Dark/light/custom theme support
Requires transmission server version 2.40 or later.
